item.title: When you lose the ability to write, you also lose some of your ability to think
item.description: - Paul Graham on Twitter said: "People are quickly adopting ChatGPT for writing tasks, and within a year, most writing could be AI-generated."

item.title: 100K Context Windows
item.description: - Claude's context window has expanded from 9K to 100K tokens, allowing it to analyze and digest hundreds of pages of materials in less than a minute.

item.title: Show HN: Boring Report, a news app that uses AI to desensationalize the news
item.description: - Boring Report is an app that uses advanced AI language models to remove sensationalism from news articles and present them in a more factual and straightforward manner.

item.title: Go with PHP
item.description: - The provided code verifies user authentication, authorizes them to place orders, validates order request data, stores orders in a database, dispatches jobs for background processing, broadcasts events to update the frontend in real-time, and returns orders in JSON format.

item.title: Electronics Lab Bench Setup Guide
item.description: - The article is a comprehensive guide on how to set up an electronics lab bench, including in-depth information on bench setup, organization, test equipment, prototyping supplies, soldering tools, hand tools, consumables, and computer workstation.

item.title: Google Earth 3D Models Now Available as Open Standard (GlTF)
item.description: - Google Maps Platform has launched an experimental release of Photorealistic 3D Tiles available through the Map Tiles API, offering a 3D mesh model of the real-world with high-res RGB optical imagery.

item.title: Scientists regenerate hair cells that enable hearing
item.description: - Hearing loss affects millions of people worldwide due to the destruction of hair cells responsible for relaying sounds to the brain.

item.title: Windows 11 in Svelte
item.description: - The open-source project 'Windows 11 in Svelte' aims to replicate the Windows 11 desktop experience on the web, featuring a 100% Lighthouse score and a range of desktop and taskbar features, including a dark mode.

item.title: Fuck being productive
item.description: - The author is expressing their decision to prioritize rest and recreation over being productive.

item.title: Majority of gig economy workers are earning below minimum wage: research
item.description: - The majority of gig economy workers, such as Uber and Lyft drivers, are earning below the minimum wage in the United States, according to a study by the University of California, Berkeley.
